item.title: 印度东部邦选民名单修订引发法庭之争
item.description: 印度东部比哈尔邦决定在全邦大选前几个月对选民名单进行大规模修订，这一决定引发了该国最高法院的众多法律挑战，因为成千上万的选民有可能被剥夺选举权。【原文：A decision to undertake extensive revision of voter lists in the eastern Indian province of Bihar, months before a state-wide election, has prompted numerous legal challenges in the country’s Supreme Court as thousands risk getting disenfranchised.】

item.title: 迪拜房地产公司在国内掀起 70% 的热潮后转战迈阿密和悉尼
item.description: 迪拜的开发商们正在向海外扩张以寻求增长，此举有助于他们利用已积累的现金，并在国内经济可能放缓的情况下提供缓冲。【原文：Developers in Dubai are expanding abroad in search of growth, a move that helps them use the cash piles they’ve built up and offers a cushion in case of any potential slowdown at home.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司拒绝同行提出的解决财务问题的最后建议
item.description: 泰晤士河水务公司在最后一刻拒绝了一位英国世袭贵族提出的解决其财务问题并避免国有化的建议，而是选择坚持债权人主导的救援计划。【原文：Thames Water dismissed a last-minute proposal from a British hereditary peer to fix its finances and fend off nationalization, opting instead to stick with the creditor-led rescue plan.】

item.title: 英国石油公司上游主管阐述扭亏为盈计划的机制
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）已将重振油气业务作为其扭亏为盈计划的核心，上游业务主管戈登-伯瑞尔（Gordon Birrell）正牵头推动该业务成为更可靠的利润驱动力。【原文：BP Plc has put an oil and gas revival at the heart of its turnaround plan, and upstream chief Gordon Birrell is leading the push to make the business a more reliable driver of profits.】

item.title: 据说阿斯特化学公司正在洽谈收购埃克森新加坡加油站的事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印尼 Chandra Asri 集团与全球大宗商品交易商嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc）的合资企业 Aster Chemicals and Energy Pte 正在洽谈收购石油巨头埃克森美孚公司在新加坡的加油站。【原文：Aster Chemicals and Energy Pte, a joint venture between Indonesia’s Chandra Asri Group and global commodities trader Glencore Plc, is in talks to buy oil major Exxon Mobil Corp.’s gas stations in Singapore, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 英伟达黄仁勋将与中国领导人会晤，人工智能限制加深
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）联合创始人黄仁勋下周将在北京会见中国高级官员，这标志着该公司对华盛顿日益寻求孤立的广阔市场的承诺。【原文：Nvidia Corp. co-founder Jensen Huang will meet with senior Chinese officials in Beijing next week, signaling the company’s commitment to a vast market Washington is increasingly seeking to isolate.】

item.title: 马云支持的蚂蚁金服将把 Circle 的稳定币纳入全球平台
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，马云支持的蚂蚁金服集团公司正在与Circle Internet Group Inc.合作，在这家中国金融科技公司的区块链平台上采用其稳定币。【原文：Jack Ma-backed Ant Group Co. is working with Circle Internet Group Inc. to adopt its stablecoin on the Chinese fintech company’s blockchain platform, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 曼尼帕尔医院从加拿大 OTPP 公司以 7 亿美元收购 Sahyadri 公司
item.description: Manipal Health Enterprises Pvt. 公司以约 7 亿美元的价格收购了 Sahyadri 医院的多数股权，为印度的医疗保健交易再添一笔，并对阿波罗医院企业有限公司（Apollo Hospitals Enterprise Ltd.）的主导地位构成挑战。【原文：Manipal Health Enterprises Pvt. has acquired a majority stake in Sahyadri Hospitals for about $700 million, adding to a flurry of health care deals in India and challenging the dominance of Apollo Hospitals Enterprise Ltd.】

item.title: 据说 SBI 计划最早下周出售 29 亿美元股票
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度资产规模最大的贷款机构印度国家银行正准备最快于下周向机构投资者出售高达 2,500 亿卢比（约合 29 亿美元）的股票，这可能是印度最大的同类交易。【原文：State Bank of India, the country’s largest lender by assets, is preparing to sell as much as 250 billion rupees ($2.9 billion) of shares to institutional investors as soon as next week, according to people familiar with the matter, in what could be the nation’s biggest deal of its kind.】

item.title: 交易员关注简街禁令的印度到期日余波
item.description: 交易员们正在仔细检查印度的衍生品市场，观察简街集团被禁之后的异常交易迹象。虽然本交易日开盘平静，但随着到期日的到来，波动率和期权交易量成为市场关注的焦点。【原文：Traders are scrutinizing India’s derivatives market, watching for signs of unusual trading following a ban on Jane Street Group. While the session started calmly, volatility and options volume are on focus as the expiration day unfolds.】

item.title: 美国削减关税被视为 "良好开端"，斯里兰卡将继续会谈
item.description: 斯里兰卡财政部长哈沙纳-苏里亚佩鲁玛（Harshana Suriyapperuma）周四表示，在唐纳德-特朗普总统决定降低对岛国的关税后，科伦坡认为这是一个 "良好的开端"，斯里兰卡希望继续与美国进行谈判。【原文：Sri Lanka expects to continue negotiations with the US after President Donald Trump’s decision to reduce tariffs on the island nation is seen as a “good start” by Colombo which had primarily negotiated to preserve its competitive advantage, Treasury Secretary Harshana Suriyapperuma said Thursday.】

item.title: 毛里求斯邀请瑞士财富管理公司促进金融业发展
item.description: 毛里求斯正在计划减税和减少官僚主义障碍，以吸引来自瑞士的财富经理和希望将部分资产保留在国外的印度富人。【原文：Mauritius is planning tax breaks and fewer bureaucratic hurdles to lure wealth managers from Switzerland and tap rich Indians looking to keep part of their assets outside the country.】

item.title: 优衣库因中国销售疲软利润不及预期
item.description: Fast Retailing Co. 公布的第三季度收益不及预期，原因是中国市场销售疲软拖累了这家日本服装制造商的业绩。【原文：Fast Retailing Co. reported third-quarter earnings that missed estimates, as weaker sales in China weighed on the Japanese apparel maker’s performance.】

item.title: 三星计划于 2025 年推出首款三折智能手机
item.description: 三星电子公司计划在今年晚些时候开始销售一款三折智能手机，与竞争对手华为技术有限公司一起开拓一个相对未经测试的市场。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. plans to begin selling a trifold smartphone later this year, joining rival Huawei Technologies Co. in exploring a relatively untested market.】

item.title: 日本央行分行经理报告显示利率将处于观望状态
item.description: 一份关于日本央行分行经理会议的报告对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的全面关税政策的影响未作明确说明，这凸显了日本央行在考虑再次加息之前的观望态度。【原文：A report on the Bank of Japan’s branch managers’ meeting offered little clarity over the impact of President Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs, underscoring the central bank’s wait-and-see mode before considering another interest rate hike.】

item.title: 供应充足，欧洲天然气波动率降至 2021 年以来最低点
item.description: 欧洲天然气市场的短期波动降至近四年来的最低水平，因为充足的供应盖过了对全球潜在需求激增的担忧。【原文：Short-term volatility in Europe’s natural gas market dropped to the lowest level in nearly four years as ample supply overshadows concerns about potential demand spikes across the globe.】

item.title: 挪威核心通胀率四个月来首次加快
item.description: 挪威的基本通胀率四个月来首次上升，基本符合预期，并巩固了央行在夏季之后采取更多宽松政策的前景。【原文：Norway’s underlying inflation rate rose for the first time in four months, largely matching expectations and cementing the central bank’s outlook for more easing after the summer.】

item.title: 关于未经证实的会议的报道引发中国房地产股大涨
item.description: 受下周将召开高级别会议帮助重振陷入困境的房地产行业的猜测推动，中国房地产股指数创下近九个月来的最大涨幅。【原文：A gauge of Chinese property shares posted its biggest gain in nearly nine months, fueled by speculation a high-level meeting will be held next week to help revive the struggling sector.】

item.title: 印度团队可能很快访问美国以推进贸易谈判
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的官员透露，一个印度贸易代表团可能在未来几天内访问华盛顿，就贸易协议展开进一步会谈。【原文：An Indian trade delegation is likely to visit Washington in the coming days for further talks on a trade deal, according to an official familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 甲骨文据称将在印度尼西亚推进云服务计划
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，甲骨文公司将与 DayOne Data Centers Singapore Pte 合作，在印度尼西亚建立首个云服务中心，从而加强与该地区重要运营商的合作关系。【原文：Oracle Corp. will partner with DayOne Data Centers Singapore Pte to establish its first cloud services center in Indonesia, people familiar with the matter said, boosting its partnership with a key regional operator that counts TikTok owner ByteDance Ltd as its largest customer.】

item.title: Binance 创始人家族办公室以 10 倍资本支持 BNB 游戏
item.description: Binance 联合创始人赵长鹏和何毅的家族办公室 YZi Labs 将支持投资公司 10X Capital 在美国成立一家上市公司，以投资 BNB。【原文：YZi Labs, the family office of Binance co-founders Changpeng Zhao and Yi He, will back investment firm 10X Capital to set up a publicly traded company in the US to invest in BNB, a token linked to the crypto exchange the pair started.】

item.title: A&M称，法国是欧洲受困企业最多的国家
item.description: 去年，由于劳动力市场疲软和商业情绪恶化，法国陷入财务困境的公司比例飙升幅度最大。【原文：France registered the biggest spike in the proportion of companies in financial distress last year as the country struggled with a weak labor market and deteriorating business sentiment.】

item.title: 亚马逊在德里开始 10 分钟送达服务，推动快速电子商务发展
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）已开始在新德里提供最快 10 分钟送达的服务，从而加剧了与当地竞争对手在增长最快的在线零售领域的竞争。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. has begun offering deliveries in as little as 10 minutes in New Delhi, revving up competition with local rivals in one of the fastest-growing segments of online retail.】
